resources.string: ᱠᱚᱱᱴᱟᱠᱴ ᱴᱨᱮᱥᱤᱝ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ ᱟᱢᱟᱜ ᱢᱚᱵᱟᱤᱞ ᱮᱞ ᱫᱚᱨᱠᱟᱨ ᱾.

ᱢᱮᱛᱟᱜᱢᱮ, you met someone a week back at a gathering or were in close proximity of someone unknown at a public place, and in a few days, they test positive for COVID-19.

The Government of India will trace back all touch points of that person, through the active devices with the app installed that were in close radius of that person, in the past 14 days. 

A notification will then be sent to all such contacts with an advisory on further course of action, to self-isolate or to get the test done at a nearest testing centre, as needed. 

By participating in active contact tracing, you will help us minimise the spread of COVID-19 and enable Government of India to implement proactive measures for your health and well-being.
We understand the nature and sensitivity of this topic and have taken strong measures to ensure that your data is not compromised.
It is recommended that you set your location sharing to ‘Always’. You can change this anytime later.
ᱟᱞᱮ ᱢᱚᱵᱟᱤᱞ OTP ᱟᱱᱟᱜ ᱢᱚᱵᱟᱤᱞ ᱮᱞ ᱵᱷᱮᱡᱟ ᱟᱠᱟᱹᱟᱭ ᱾.
ᱟᱢᱟᱜ ᱢᱚᱵᱟᱤᱞ ᱮᱞ ᱨᱮ OTP ᱨᱮ ᱵᱷᱮᱡᱟ ᱮᱱᱟ.
Monitors your device’s proximity to another mobile device.\nIt is recommended that you keep it on at all times.
Your Data will be shared only with the Government of India.\nThe App does not allow your name and number to be disclosed to the public at large at any time.
Please select your language\nकृपया अपनी भाषा चुनें
ᱞᱟᱦᱟ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ ᱫᱚᱭᱟᱠᱟᱛᱮ ᱟᱲᱟ ᱪᱚᱭᱚᱱ ᱢᱮ ᱾.
Would you like to be kept informed if you \nhave crossed paths with someone who has \ntested COVID-19 positive?
Each one of us has the power to help \nprevent the spread of the Coronavirus \npandemic in India.

Simply,
1. %s the app 
2. Switch on %s 
3. Set %s to ‘Always’ 

Invite your friends and family to 
install the app too.
Aarogya Setu tracks through a Bluetooth & Location generated social graph, your interaction with someone who could have tested COVID-19 positive.

The App alerts are accompanied by 
instructions on how to self-isolate and what 
to do in case you develop symptoms that 
may need help and support
You will be alerted if someone you have \ncome in close proximity of, even \nunknowingly, tests COVID-19 positive.
With Aarogya Setu, you can protect yourself, \nyour family and friends, and help our \ncountry in the effort to fight COVID-19
If you would like to contribute to a safer India please indicate your acceptance of the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy by clicking on the button below:
There is some error logging you in
You are not allowed to sign in
Failed to update. Tap to retry.
To help contact tracing, your interaction data captured with Bluetooth and Location services will be shared with Government of India.
ᱟᱢᱟᱜ ᱥᱟᱹᱠᱷᱤᱭᱟᱛ ᱟᱢᱟᱜ ᱯᱷᱚᱱ ᱨᱮ ᱥᱟᱱᱪᱟᱣ ᱟᱠᱟᱱᱟ ᱾ ᱥᱮᱠᱭᱚ ᱥᱚᱨᱠᱟᱨᱤ ᱥᱚᱨᱵᱷᱚᱨ ᱛᱮ ᱵᱷᱮᱡᱟᱭ ᱢᱮ…
Sending interaction data captured with Bluetooth & Location services to Government of India.
ᱟᱢᱟᱜ ᱥᱟᱹᱫᱠᱷᱤᱭᱟᱛ ᱫᱚ ᱥᱤᱧᱚᱛ ᱥᱚᱨᱠᱟᱨᱤ ᱥᱚᱨᱵᱷᱚᱨ ᱨᱮ ᱢᱮᱱᱟᱜᱼᱟ ᱾.
ᱰᱤᱜᱟᱹᱣ ᱮᱱᱟ, ᱫᱚᱭᱟᱠᱟᱛᱮ ᱫᱩᱦᱲᱟ ᱪᱮᱥᱴᱟᱭ ᱢᱮ᱾.
To keep you safe and up-to-date, this app needs access to bluetooth and location. You can enable these in your phone settings.
ᱫᱚᱭᱟᱠᱟᱛᱮ ᱤᱱᱴᱚᱨᱱᱮᱴ ᱠᱚᱱᱮᱠᱥᱚᱱ ᱧᱮᱞ ᱵᱤᱰᱟᱣ ᱢᱮ
Location settings are inadequate, and cannot be fixed here. Fix in Settings.
Bluetooth must be on at all times to track your proximity to other devices and give you accurate safety updates.
ᱟᱢᱟᱜ ᱯᱷᱚᱱ WiFi ᱟᱨ ᱢᱚᱵᱟᱤᱞ ᱰᱟᱴᱟ ᱥᱟᱞᱟᱜ ᱡᱩᱲᱟᱣ ᱠᱟᱱᱟ ᱥᱮ ᱵᱟᱝ ᱧᱮᱞ ᱵᱤᱲᱟᱣ ᱢᱮ ᱾.
ᱵᱚᱞᱚ ᱦᱩᱲᱟᱹᱜ ᱾ ᱫᱚᱭᱟᱠᱟᱛᱮ ᱫᱩᱦᱲᱟᱹ ᱪᱮᱥᱴᱟᱭ ᱢᱮ
Share only if you have tested positive for COVID-19 or are currently being tested
COVID-19 ᱵᱟᱵᱚᱫ ᱠᱩᱠᱞᱤ ᱠᱚ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱪ ᱦᱮᱞᱛᱷ ᱢᱤᱱᱤᱥᱴᱨᱭ ᱴᱚᱞ-ᱯᱷᱨᱤ ᱜᱚᱲᱚᱞᱟᱹᱭᱤᱱ
ᱚᱞᱜᱟ ᱦᱚᱲ ᱠᱚᱣᱟᱜ ᱦᱚᱲᱢᱚ ᱥᱛᱤᱛᱷᱤ ᱵᱟᱲᱟᱭ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ QR Code ᱥᱠᱟᱱ ᱢᱮ
ᱦᱚᱲᱢᱚ ᱦᱟᱞᱚᱛ ᱵᱟᱲᱟᱭ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ QR ᱠᱚᱲ ᱥᱠᱟᱱ ᱢᱮ
QR ᱠᱚᱲ ᱨᱤᱯᱷᱨᱮᱥ ᱯᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ ᱴᱤᱲᱟᱹᱜ ᱢᱮ
ᱱᱚᱶᱟ ᱫᱚ ᱚᱯᱷᱤᱥᱤᱭᱟᱞ ᱟᱨᱚᱜᱭᱟ ᱥᱮᱛᱩ ᱮᱯ ᱨᱮ ᱵᱟᱭ ᱛᱮᱭᱟᱨ ᱠᱟᱱᱟ ᱾.
ᱫᱚᱭᱟᱠᱟᱛᱮ ᱱᱟᱶᱟ ᱠᱚᱰ ᱛᱮᱭᱟᱨ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ ᱦᱚᱲ ᱱᱮᱦᱚᱨ ᱮᱢ
Qr code ᱦᱟᱢᱮᱴᱚᱜ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ ᱫᱚᱭᱟᱠᱟᱛᱮ ᱪᱷᱟᱰ ᱮᱢᱚᱜᱼᱢᱮ
QR code ᱥᱠᱟᱱᱤᱝ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱩᱤᱫ ᱮᱢ ᱠᱮᱢᱨᱟ ᱪᱷᱟᱰ ᱫᱚᱨᱠᱟᱨ ᱾.
ᱠᱤᱪᱦᱤ ᱵᱷᱩᱞ ᱦᱩᱭᱮᱱᱟ ᱾ ᱫᱚᱭᱟᱠᱟᱛᱮ ᱟᱨᱦᱚ ᱥᱠᱟᱱ ᱢᱮ ᱾.
ᱟᱨᱦᱚᱸ ᱡᱤᱱᱤᱥ ᱠᱚ ᱡᱮᱢᱚᱱ ᱜᱚᱲᱚ ᱞᱟᱭᱤᱱ, ᱩᱠᱩ ᱮᱠᱛᱤᱭᱟᱨ, Terms of Use ᱟᱨ ᱟᱨᱦᱚ ᱱᱚᱰᱮ ᱧᱮᱢᱚᱜᱼᱟ ᱾.
